official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code relating to the mailing free of postage of bills by nonprofit health clinics receiving Federal financial assistance.

summary.text: Permits tax-exempt health clinics to mail bills for services free of postage during any fiscal year in which such a clinic receives other Federal assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code relating to the mailing free of postage of bills by nonprofit health clinics receiving Federal financial assistance.
